articles.title: Nvidia’s ‘personal AI supercomputer’ goes on sale October 15th
articles.description: Nvidia will start selling its DGX Spark “personal AI supercomputer" this week. The machine is powerful enough to let users work on sophisticated AI models but small enough to fit on a desktop.   Nvidia said Spark can be ordered online at nvidia.com starting Wednesday, October 15th, as well as from select partners and stores in […]
articles.author: Robert Hart
